attributes.additional_details: I want the government to ban page 3 because we have lads mags for that although I don't believe page 3 is aimed to make women seem below men it does do in many ways. it's also not nice when you'r granddad opens the newspaper and there's a nude women. thanks for reading i hope you can realize that the government should either put pressure on page 3 or ban it, i hope you decide to sign my petition..
